original_definition: 'solar water heater' means a water heater equipped with one or more solar collectors, solar hot water storage tanks, heat generators and possibly pumps in the collector loop and other parts; a solar water heater is placed on the market as one unit;
generated_definition: 'solar water heater' means a device that uses solar energy to heat water.
